org.joo.steak.framework

Interface StateTransition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStateTransition, AbstractTransitionProxy, SimpleStateTransition, TransitionLazyLoadProxy, TransitionPrototypeProxy

    public interface StateTransition
    A transition determines which state to move to from a starting state based on some conditions.
    Author:
    griever

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getNextState()
      Get the next state from the starting state
      boolean isSatisfiedBy(java.lang.Object args)
      Check if this transition upon some object should be in effect

    • Method Detail

      • isSatisfiedBy

        boolean isSatisfiedBy(java.lang.Object args)
        Check if this transition upon some object should be in effect
        Parameters:
        args - the object to be checked
        Returns:
        true if condition matched and we should use this transition

      • getNextState

        java.lang.String getNextState()
        Get the next state from the starting state
        Returns:
        the next state
